#Week 1
### Writing a Michaelis-Menten Function 
Fixed Values + Umax = 1 
Ks = 100 
Formula U = Umax S / Ks + S
 
```{r mm-function}
mm_function <- function(Um, Ks, S){
 U <- Um*S/(Ks+S)
 plot(S,U)
 }
S <- seq(from = 0, to = 200, by = 1)
mm_function(Um =1, Ks = 100, S = S)
  
```
